content: Phase 1: Create enhanced command template with integrated architecture (2h)
Phase 2: Enhance high-priority commands with integrated architecture (4h)
Phase 2a: Enhance system-audit.md with embedded validation and principle compliance
Phase 2b: Enhance create-ticket.md with integrated agent deployment and template application
Phase 2c: Enhance review-tickets.md with complete execution environment and quality validation
Phase 2d: Enhance modularize.md with embedded component patterns and automated validation
Phase 3: Implement main assistant delegation logic (1h)
